sentences.en: {"GLOSS":["calls from an unknown person saying obscene things"],"COLLOINEXA":["obscene phone calls"]}

sentences.cn: 布拉德福德做了个下流手势。

sentences.en: His comment is not repeatable, because they are rude , obscene, etc.
sentences.cn: 他的话别人实在说不出口.

sentences.en: His comments are not repeatable, eg because they were rude , obscene, etc.
sentences.cn: 他的话别人实在说不出口(如因粗俗 、 下流等).

sentences.en: His comments are repeatable , eg because they were rude, obscene, etc.
sentences.cn: 她使用下流的语言是很失礼的事.

sentences.en: His language won't bear repeating, eg because it's too obscene.
sentences.cn: 他的话别人实在说不出口(如因太下流).

sentences.en: His presence seemed to shed light over that base and obscene haunt.
sentences.cn: 他的神采似乎照亮了那个下流而肮脏的处所.

sentences.en: His salary was obscene for three 40-minute shows a week.
sentences.cn: 他一周只有3次节目，每次40分钟，但他的薪水实在高得离谱。

sentences.en: Is the sad and tragic victim of this industry obscene.
sentences.cn: 他们是这个最污秽的行业中最悲惨的受害者.

sentences.en: It came from Myrtle, who had overheard the question, and it was violent and obscene.
sentences.cn: 它来自茉特尔, 因为她凑巧听见了问题, 而她讲的话是义粗暴又不干净的.

sentences.en: It was obscene to spend millions producing unwanted food.
sentences.cn: 耗资数百万去生产一些不需要的食品，真是令人发指。

sentences.en: Never tell stories that are not decent , ie that are obscene.
Obscene and threatening phone calls are against the law.
sentences.cn: 猥亵和恐吓电话都是违法的。

sentences.en: The boy was Capering dersively, with obscene unambiguous gestures, before a party of English tourists.
sentences.cn: 这个顽童在一群英国旅游客人面前用明显下流的动作可笑地蹦蹦跳跳着.

sentences.en: The law is the final arbiter of what is considered obscene.
sentences.cn: 何谓猥亵最终由法律裁决。

sentences.en: The obscene words he said to the girl were extremely disgusting.
sentences.cn: 他对那个女孩说的那些浪语,真是不堪入耳.

sentences.en: The only alien thing was the obscene wet cigar butt in the plate.
sentences.cn: 唯一不相容的东西,就是那一截又脏又潮的雪茄烟头.

words.tran_cn: 猥亵，淫秽；猥亵的言语（或行为）

trans.tran_cn: 淫秽的，下流的，猥亵的，大得惊人的
trans.tran_en: relating to sex in a way that is shocking and offensive
